snippet: Sales are booming after the daughter of Korean Air Line’s chairman threw a well-publicized fit on a flight when she was served macadamia nuts in a bag instead of on a plate.
abstract: Sales of macadamia nuts are soaring in South Korea in wake of incident on Korean Air Line flight involving daughter of airline's chairman, who threw tantrum after nuts were improperly served to her on a flight; sales of macadamia nuts went from 5 percent of market to nearly 50 percent.
lead_paragraph: Sales are booming after the daughter of Korean Air Line’s chairman threw a well-publicized fit on a flight when she was served macadamia nuts in a bag instead of on a plate.

headline.main: Macadamia Nut Sales Explode After a Korean Air Tantrum
headline.print_headline: Macadamia Nut Sales Explode After a Korean Air Tantrum
